title: Impossible de commencer l'initialisation de mon pixel 3 a Android 12 apr√®s reconfiguration uzine
content: HELP! My phone started to reboot in a loop for hours. I had no choice but to reset everything and restart my phone. I am now trying to initialize my phone but cannot get through the "copy your application and data" step whether I use the "do not copy" option or even the following one. It then asks me for my security scheme which is validated, it loads for 2 seconds and then returns to the previous page asking me again to copy or not my google account information.
